get.description: Query for series from specific study's UID

post.description:
This transaction creates a Workitem on the target Worklist. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-CREATE operation.

See [Create Workitem Transaction](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.4)

get.description:
This transaction retrieves a Workitem. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-GET operation.

See [Retrieve Workitem Transaction](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.5)

This transaction retrieves a Workitem. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-GET operation.

See [Retrieve Workitem Transaction](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.5)

post.description:
This transaction modifies Attributes of an existing Workitem. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-SET operation.

See [Update Workitem Transaction](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.6)

put.description:
This transaction is used to change the state of a Workitem. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-ACTION operation "Change UPS State".
State changes are used to claim ownership, complete, or cancel a Workitem.

See [Change Workitem State](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.7)

200.description: The update was successful, and the response payload contains a Status Report document.

post.description:
This transaction creates a Subscription to a Worklist or Workitem resource. It corresponds to the UPS DIMSE N-ACTION operation "Subscribe to Receive UPS Event Reports".

See [Subscribe Transaction](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.10)

delete.description:
This transaction is used to stop the origin server from sending new Event Reports to the user agent and may also stop the origin server from subscribing the user agent to new Workitems.

See [Unsubscribe Transaction](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.11)

post.description:
This transaction is used to stop the origin server from automatically subscribing the User-Agent to new Workitems. This does not delete any existing subscriptions to specific Workitems.
See [Suspend Global Subscription Transaction](https://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/html/part18.html#sect_11.12)

get.description: Retrieve instance's bulk data of specific tag
Retrieve Study's Series' instance's rendered images

200.description: The response payload for WADO-RS Thumbnail
The response payload for WADO-RS Thumbnail
The response payload for WADO-RS Thumbnail
The response payload for WADO-RS Thumbnail

DicomMetadata.description: The metadata JSON of DICOM instance

AccessionNumber.description: A RIS generated number that identifies the order for the Study.

ReferringPhysicianName.description: Name of the Patient's referring physician

StudyID.description: User or equipment generated Study identifier.

aeTitle.name: aeTitle
aeTitle.description: The Application Entity Title of a Subscriber.

frameNumbers.name: frameNumbers
frameNumbers.description: comma separated list of one or more non duplicate frame numbers

viewport.name: viewport
viewport.description: Viewport Scaling of Image in format, viewport=vw,vh or viewport=vw,vh,sx,sy,sw,sh

queryStudyUID.name: studyUID
queryStudyUID.description: Study Instance UID for a single Study

querySeriesUID.name: studyUID
querySeriesUID.description: Series Instance UID for a single Series

queryInstanceUID.name: objectUID
queryInstanceUID.description: SOP Instance UID for a single Instance

region.name: region
region.description: Region of the Image, its values shall be a comma-separated list of four positive decimal numbers

rows.name: rows
rows.description: number of pixel rows in the returned image

columns.name: columns
columns.description: number of pixel columns in the returned image

windowCenter.name: windowCenter
windowCenter.description: Window Center of the returned image, required if `windowWidth` present

windowWidth.name: windowWidth
windowWidth.description: Window Width of the returned image, required if `windowCenter` present

iccprofile.name: iccprofile
iccprofile.description: the color characteristics of, and inclusion of an ICC Profile in, the rendered images
